long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Did you know that booking directly with hotels is often cheaper than going with major travel sites? With Hotelio, we're making hotel rates even cheaper: every time you book a hotel directly and have Hotelio installed, you'll get up to 7% cash back, all with the click of a button! 

Simply install the Hotelio Chrome extension, book directly with your favorite hotel, forward your reservation and receive cash back! You can even earn and redeem loyalty points, further increasing your savings! 

Have a credit card with cash back or points? You can earn those too, on top of your Hotelio cash back! We're serious when we say this is the cheapest way to book.

Hotelio is compatible on over 5 million rooms from some of the most popular brands. Wether you're traveling for work, planning a family vacation, or just simply need a last-minute room, Hotelio has you covered.
